sentences.sContent: the products that are currently available
He is currently working on his first novel.
sentences.sCn: 他目前正在创作他的第一本小说。

sentences.sContent: ...We're currently working closely; the office of the Surgeon General is working closely with the Food and Drug Administration...
...A chip-and-PIN card currently costs closer to $3...
...an object currently hated by many environmentalists and energy-efficiency advocates...
...and currently contains over 600 million barrels of oil...
...Late-stage developing nations that are currently industrialising rapidly...
...there's a huge disconnect between the way we currently train scientists and the actual employment opportunities available for them...
...Better irrigation can dramatically improve crop yield and about 40% of the world's food supply is currently derived from irrigated land...
...Governments of rapidly developing countries incorporate waste minimisation thinking into the transport infrastructure and storage facilities currently being planned...

words.tran: 现在的；流通的，通用的；最近的；草写的
